Dummy controller¶

This is a dummy device, simulated for developing and testing the code

class hyperion.controller.dummy_output_controller.DummyOutputController¶

Dummy output device

amplitude¶

Gets the amplitude value

finalize()¶

this is to close connection to the device.

idn()¶

Identify command :return: identification for the device :rtype: string

initialize(port)¶

Starts the connection to the device in port

Parameters:port (string) – port name to connect to
query(msg)¶

writes into the device

read()¶

Fake read that returns always

write(msg)¶

writes into the device
